mentors.name: Jane Doe
mentors.fullBio: Jane Doe is an MFA student at the School of Visual Arts, New York City. She graduated from UC Irvine in 2016, and works predominantly in Photography. Longer lines of text are usually full of extraneous words very much like this one indeed. I need this thing to be justified omg.
